name: On-the-Glow Blush & Illuminator
about: What it is:An all-in-one beauty enhancer for the face and cheeks with a highlighter on one end and a blush on the other..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin E: Has antioxidant properties and prevents free-radical-inducing damage..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Bring natural-looking color to the lips and cheeks with the dual-ended On-the-Glow Blush & Illuminator. Its cream-to-powder formula glides on effortlessly and blends seamlessly onto skin while adding gorgeous color and luminous sheen to every complexion.
ingredients: -Vitamin E: Has antioxidant properties and prevents free-radical-inducing damage...Bare:.Octyldodecanol, Triethylhexanoin, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Silica, Ceresin, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Synthetic Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Glyceryl Caprylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, (+/-): CI 77891, CI 15850, CI 77491, CI 19140, CI 77499...Nude Glow: .Octyldodecanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Triethylhexanoin, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica, Ceresin, Mica, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Synthetic Wax, Microcrystalline Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide, (+/-): CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 15850, CI 75470....
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Lips: .-Apply the cream color to lips directly from the stick or press color onto lips using fingers. ..Cheeks: .-Swipe or dot the cream color across the apples of your cheeks and blend using fingers or a brush. .-Apply the cream illuminator on the top of cheekbones for more luminosity. ..Eyes: .-Using fingers, blend the cream color or illuminator across lids and into the crease. .-Apply the illuminator under the browbone and the inner corners...Body: .-Swipe the cream illuminator on shoulders, du00e9colletage, and anywhere else youu2018d like to add glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast with a penchant for ethereal makeup, I couldn't resist trying Wander Beauty's coveted On the Glow Blush and Illuminator. I'm here to share my experience of this enchanting duo that has transformed my complexion into a radiant indulgence.   The blush is an absolute stunner. Its velvety-smooth texture blends effortlessly into the skin, leaving a natural-looking flush of color that mimics the youthful bloom of springtime. The shade 'Posie' is a peachy-coral dream that instantly brightens my face without overpowering my natural tone.  Oh, the illuminator! It's a shimmering symphony of light-reflecting particles that create a soft, ethereal glow. The shade 'Lit from Within' is a universal hue that flatters all skin tones. Applied to the high points of my face, it adds a hint of luminosity that makes my skin look healthy and radiant.  When combined, the blush and illuminator form an irresistible duo that enhances my features seamlessly. The blush adds a touch of color and warmth, while the illuminator illuminates my skin, creating a balanced and flattering look. The effect is subtle yet stunning, leaving me with a complexion that radiates from within.  One of the most impressive aspects of this product is its long-lasting wear. The blush and illuminator stay in place for hours without fading or smudging. Even after a full day of activities, my makeup remains fresh and vibrant.  The On the Glow Blush and Illuminator is incredibly versatile. It can be used to create a subtle everyday look or a glamorous evening glow. The compact design is perfect for travel or touch-ups on the go.  If you're looking for a makeup duo that will elevate your complexion to celestial heights, look no further than Wander Beauty's On the Glow Blush and Illuminator. This combination of high-quality, long-lasting products delivers a radiant, natural-looking glow that will make you feel radiant and unforgettable. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The On-the-Glow Blush & Illuminator by Wander Beauty has become a new favorite in my makeup bag. This dual-ended stick is incredibly convenient, with a blush on one end and a highlighter on the other. The cream-to-powder formula is fantastic as it glides on smoothly and blends seamlessly, giving my skin a beautiful, natural finish.  I love the medium coverage, which is just right for adding a healthy flush of color to my cheeks and a subtle glow with the highlighter. I love that it has vitamin E as it's a great bonus, as it helps protect my skin from damage.  This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free, which makes me feel good about using it. It's perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, and I appreciate how it enhances my complexion easily. Overall, it's a versatile and high-quality product that I highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Love it for maturing, sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this, but I'm really glad I tried it. It's not perfect, as I find the wear time of the blush to be a little short. BUT the colour, ease of application, and that highlighter shade!!! more than make up for it. It's nice to just look nice and not have a face like a glitter bomb went off close by. You can keep this nice and subtle, and use it with or without a base. Primer is highly recommended to extend wear time, but even if that's not your thing, I simply reapply once in a while. It takes two seconds, and it's too pretty for me to care about an occasional touch up on bare skin. The older I get, the more the old touch up makes more sense. For my own skin, well-done makeup and nice healthy-looking results don't always fall into the 24-hour wear category. Once I made peace with that, makeup life got much more pleasant again.

It stays on all day, including in humidity and heat (took it in a vacation).  I thought it would be heavy, as some creamy blushes are, and this was not.  I would buy this product for long term use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to other products that I have tried that are similar, the Wander Beauty On The Glow Blush & Illuminator far exceeds the competition. It is silky smooth and melts into your skin beautifully. It looks very natural and wears easily. I think the biggest benefit to owning this product is that fact that you can use it as your only product to do a quick two minute face. I love to use the illuminator as an eyeshadow and like to rub some of the blush on my lips for a little color. This one little stick can easily slide into your purse for touch ups without taking up hardly any room.  I will definitely be buying this product once it suns out, it is something I donu2019t want to go without! I cannot recommend this product more to my friends and family. One of my friends has already picked one up. It is a great product and I just canu2019t stop talking about it. I have gotten many compliments about my complexion and asked if I have been doing anything different and thatu2019s when I let them know my new little secret!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the color options, itu2019s a two-in-one product which is compact for an on the go look. The formula of both the blush and illuminator are super creamy and easy to work with. They are buildable for your choice of a softer or more intense look. Itu2019s better to blend with your fingers so the formula can melt in your skin. Pilling occurs if you have any products underneath which is why I dropped a star. I tend to use this as a u201cno make upu201d makeup look without foundation to give me some color and life back into my face. I wouldnu2019t use the illuminator if you arenu2019t a fan of your skinu2019s texture, the cream definitely highlights the skins texture and makes it look more noticeable. I would recommend this to my friends who are looking to add some color back to the face. I also used the blush on my lips to pair them. Doubles as a lipstick. I have added two photos, one is my before photo, the next is after application of both blush and illuminator. I have no other products on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of makeup products but have always avoided cream or anything in the stick format due to preferring products with more longevity on the skin. My fingers helped to melt the products and apply more smoothly. The color did fade throughout the day. The highlighter side is definitely a more natural effect. If I wear a highlighter I usually reach for something with a more white/yellow gold tone to help brighten. I felt like this highlighter never truly dried down. The only reason I chose to review this with less stars was due to longevity of the blush without a powder blush on top and tacky/wetness of the highlighter without a powder highlighter topper as well. I think this would work best for those wanting a really dewy look or for u201cno makeup, makeupu201d type of days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love the scentless creamy formula of both the blush and the highlighter, it goes on so easy, they're non oily and blend like a dream so effortlessly. I got it in the shade Petal Pink/Nude Glow and matches my light neutral complexion perfectly.  The natural finish is one of the aspects that I love the most, the blush looks so natural and the highlighter looks like it illuminates from within, both are pigmented and super buildable.  The convenience is another super plus, it's perfect for on-the-go and quick retouches, reason why this is one of those perfect products that everyone needs, even on those days that I don't wear makeup, I use a tinted spf, or serum and swipe this duo on key areas, the blush is also really nice on the lips, and the highlighter goes perfect right under the eyebrows.   It's definitely one of my favorite makeup products so far, and I know it will remain that way for years to come. I already bought it in the coral shade and it's equally stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a fan of cream blushes especially the blush sticks. I like the packaging, the concept and ease of use. I have been wanting to try the Wander Beauty Blush stick for a while. I am glad I finally had a chance to try this blush. The texture is soft and it glides easily. It fits perfect for my combination skin. The formula is not drying nor is it too oily. It blends easily without fading. It gives my cheeks a flush of color that is glowing and bright. It is easy to apply with the dual side stick and great for multitasking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use makeup regularly and have for years.  I received this product as a sample for review.  The color, coral rose, was perfect for my skin tone.  The produce glided onto my skin, it did not tug or pull like other formulations.  The color gave me a lovely natural looking flush.  I dotted it on my cheeks and just spread it minimally.  The color stayed on my cheeks all day and did not irritate my skin.  I actually used the illuminator on my eyes, as the color, nude glow, is very similar to the shade I use for my daily eyeshadow.  I really liked how it reflected light yet still looked natural.  I was able to use eyeliner on top of it without smearing.  Both products came off easily at night with regular soap and water.  Its a great addition to my makeup arsenal and makes my routine so much easier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

I found that the blush side was perfect for cheeks and lips! I tried it on with no foundation and it looked beautiful even on naked skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually steer clear of cream based blushes and highlighters but decided to give this one a try-- and I am glad I did! I received the Petal Pink/Nude Glow stick and it is perfect for that sun-kissed glow. The color is pigmented but not overwhelmingly so.  It is very buildable and can tailor it to the look you're going for. The highlighter is excellent! It's a nice champagne shade that is universally flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been waiting for a product like this! A 2-in-1 blush and highlighter stick. So convenient and so, so, so pretty. I love that it's a stick for easy application and natural finish without glitter. I can use everyday. It blends very well with a brush and just leaves a nice glow to skin. Totally recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my travel essential. I love a multi use product to keep my packing light. It has a blush on one end and a highlighter on the other end. I got the color Petal pink and it looks very natural on me. It has a creamy formula, so easy to blend and doesn't look botchy at all. Adding the highlighter, I just like a glazed donut!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this beauty stick. The blush is fantastic the highlighter is not as great but it is not terrible. I like to blend in the blush with a sponge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous shade and gorgeous product. It looks so natural on the skin and gives me the perfect glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used the wonder beauty Skincare, specifically the eye patches, which I love. The On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator - Petal Pink/Nude Glow was the first color cosmetic I tried and loved. I love that itu2019s dual action. Highlighter and blush that can be applied to cheek bones and lips. Iu2019d definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! The coverage and intensity is buildable and the shades are so flattering. Perfect natural look and itu2019s a great on the go product. The application is easy and smooth as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Wander Beauty On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator is the perfect blush and highlighter. I got it in the color Coral Rose/Nude Glow and it is such a beautiful color. I love that the blush and highlighter are in one package, this makes it easy to travel with. It applies well, just swipe and blend in. It is easily buildable to achieve the look and intensity you desire. I like that I can put on a little for no-makeup looks or build it up for an evening out. I want to try all the colors now. This is my new go to blush and highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush and highlight are truly beautiful. I own several cream blushes and highlights and the Wander Beauty is my favorite so far. First of all, I love the convenience of having a two in one product and it being in a stick form. It's perfect on the go and easy to apply and even easier to blend out. It's not irritating to my uber-sensitive skin, and the highlight is surprisingly blinding. But it doesn't look unnatural on the skin, it reflects the light so beautifully as I move my head around. I haven't noticed any fragrance, which is good. Overall,  I highly recommend the On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am all for packing light and consolidating my beauty products and this wonder tool does just that! I now only have to carry one item that does two plus jobs! The packaging is classy and is of great quality. The shimmery highlighter is a beautiful mix of sparkle and sheen and makes my cheekbones really pop! The opposite side that contains the blush is a really pretty color that I also use as lipstick. The formula texture is creamy and goes on smoothly and lasts for a while. I definitely recommend this product to anyone who is lookin to simplify their beauty routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The blush made me look as if I had been slapped. I did like the texture of the blush. The highlighter gives off just enough color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The blush end goes on smooth and beautifully! I have used cream blush before but this one is hands down the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! Itu2019s easy to use and nice and compact so I have an illuminator and blush in one stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is really cute and modern feeling. The product reminds me of Nars, so the quality is great. Sometimes 2 in 1 products feel forced and I waste one of the products, but this combo pairs beautifully and is actually handy to have on-the-go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so easy to use and it's small enough to fit in my purse. I was able to apply this in my car with no issue and the color was great too. I like how the illuminator made me glow. It's a great blush/illuminator for on the go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love cream blushes and highlighters so I was very excited to try out this duo. It was my first time using a Wander beauty product and I was certainly impressed. The blush is u201cpetal pinku201d and is a beautiful deep pink. Iu2019m fair skinned and it works perfectly. The blush dabs on nicely and blends out very beautifully. The highlight is a nude champagne that glides on like butter and blends just as well as the blush. Both are pigmented and add great color and sheen. As someone with dry skin, I love anything that gives my face a dewy glow and this is my new go-to product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Bzzagent for my honest review. I think this is my new obsession, I'm in love with this wander beauty on the glow with blush and a illuminator. The blush color is perfect, they are both creams so they glid right on the skin easily and blend perfectly. The illuminator is soooo nice, it has such nice pigmentation (the blush too) and really makes my skin glow. I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I picked the color because itu2019s one the greatest songs ever and it definitely lived up to its name. You can blend this down to be this gorgeous berry glow that looks like you just worked out (ha!) and have that healthy flush. I am a one and done kind of makeup girl. I own sooo much, too much makeup but the things I always reach for are like this. You can do your whole face with this. Now that monochromatic is in- use this on your lips cheeks and eyes and oh did I add there is a stunning nude champagne highlighter on the other side not a wasteful brush like other stick highlighters I own. And you can use it highlight your cheek bones or eyelids.. itu2019s a perfect size to throw in a clutch for summer nights or also something that would be a great beach bag item. Everything is cream and so moisturizing it looks really natural and glowing on your skin. If my step dad didnu2019t just pass away and I wasnu2019t having to help my mom out Iu2019d be purchasing the coral today and then all of them! Also at 44 and a half I really care what I am putting on my skin, and I am think wanders products are made with health skincare and the environment in mind. This is a win for me! And I try everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised about how well this works and how good it looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fortunate enough to receive this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  Honestly?  I'm obsessed! The versatility of this product is the holy grail for those of us always on the go. The coral rose color looks great as a blush and even ad a lipstick and eyeshadow. The glow is stunning - such a soft and beautiful luminous glow that works as a highlighter or eyeshadow as well. As someone who travels, this awesome multitasker cuts down on having to pack so many products. I HIGHLY recommend this product. It'll definitely be my newest cosmetic staple from here on out.

reviews.review_title: CAN BE USED IN MORE THAN ONE WAY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the Wander Beauty On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator - Bare/Nude Glow. This product has a blush on one end and a highlight on the other. The blush shade was perfect and I could use it on my cheeks, eyes, and lips! Unlike other blush I've used in the past, this was easy to blend and creamy!! The highlight was just as gorgeous and could also be swept anywhere on the face including ur eyelids or inner corner! This is the perfect size to throw in your purse for on the go touch ups as well! I highly recommend this for all your blush and highlight needs!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Wander Beauty On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator combo set far exceeded my expectations! This product is an on the go, two in one. It contains a cream blush on one end and a cream illuminator on the other end. The container is conveniently packaged and fits perfectly in my purse. The cream blush in the color Petal Pink looks absolutely amazing on my fair skin tone. The illuminator is in the color Nude Glow and looks stunning! Both products are extremely easy to blend and buff onto your skin. I used to use powdered blush but now I will definitely switch to Wander Beauty cream blush- itu2019s so easy to apply. The makeup rinses off very easily and the finished look last me over 12 hours. I highly recommend this brand and product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve waited a long time to see this in a brighter, more rosy-red shade so I was excited to receive Strawberry Fields complimentary from BzzAgent! It blends beautifully and as I type this itu2019s standing up well to a cup of coffee. Fair complexions like mine can enjoy the bright pinky-red end as itu2019s much more sheer than it looks; the highlighter end is radiant without looking like a disco ball. Your carry-on will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stick and it's so convenient to take on the go and to use when traveling. The formula blends in super easily. The blush side is a beautiful glossy shade and the highlight provides a nice subtle shimmer. I think it would look awesome on collarbones too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product for a throw in your bag and go... But the quality of the packaging could be a bit better as the caps on either end come off very easily. Overall a great combo with great color payoff. Super blendable and pigmented. Would buy this as a staple product in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I totally love Wander Beauty On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator - Coral Rose/Nude Glow. I use it quickly every morning to refresh my look and improve my mood. Great price and quality. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Petal pink/Nude color. Super easy to apply to my cheek and easy to blend in. Nice pink flush thatu2019s gonna be fluttering to all skin tones. And the highlight is natural! I apply to my cheekbones, nose and center of my lip. I live in hot, humid Texas, this stick can stay for about 6 - 8 hours! It will be great for travel and touch-up on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wander Beauty On-The-Glow Blush & Illuminator is easy to use and doesnu2019t require an expensive brush or any other accessory to apply, unless you prefer to. This stick can easily be carried for travel and includes the blush and illuminator in one device. This color is a light pink, but is buildable if you apply more. I prefer to use the highlighter on my cheeks and under my brows. It is an affordable, easy to use make up stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the convenience of a double sided product. The blush required a heavier hand to show up on dark skin. Looked more pink than berry/purple colored when applied. The highlighter worked fine enough also needed to be built. I would use for the conscience of two products in one but wonu2019t be adding to my regular makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so convenient to keep Wander Beauty On-The-Glow blush and illuminator in the handbag whenever I go out so I don't have to carry two products with me and I don't need any sponge, it won't make my hands dirty. The color is natural and can go with any outfit. The texture is smooth and creamy, so easy to apply then spread out with fingers. I would love to buy other colors and will recommend to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: EXPERIENCE: I tried the blush and illuminator with my basic routine for a wedding I was attending  and my friends said it looked like I had gotten my makeup done professionally.       - GIVES YOU A NATURAL SUNKISSED LOOK      -EASY TO USE      -CONVENIENT TO CARRY IN SMALL PURSE     - SMALL AMOUNT GOES A LONG WAY  SKILL SET: Beginner, I usually just wear the basics of mascara and tinted moisturizer.  BOTTOM LINE: I will be adding this product into my makeup bag. My friends all want to try it now too. GET IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this illuminator and blush! Goes on so smooth and gives my skin a great glow! The bare and nude colors are perfect for me! Lasted long on my skin without being greasy. This is my new go to for the summer and less for me to carry in my makeup bag! Thank you Wander!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how much I love this. I recently did a purge of all my makeup because I wanted to downsize and this product is handy and compact (while still giving you a ton of product). I am very fair and the petal pink gives me the perfect healthy pop of color. I was hesitant with how dark the illuminator appeared in the package but it goes on beautifully.  I actually think I want to venture out of my comfort zone and try the darker raspberry! I'd love to see a red for the holidays and an eyeshadow line in this packaging! I added a marker for size comparison in the pic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

I used the highlighter on my cheeks and just under my brows.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is very creamy and lasts which is good for older skin. It's great for travel because it is 2 in 1 and easy to pack. I really like the color too. Subtle and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Wander Beauty on the glow blush and illuminator is really impressive! I love the fact that the formula is so creamy and comfortable on the skin. The finish is so pretty, natural. Like your skin but better. I love it! I just love how this makes you look so ethereal and youthful as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My current favorite blush and glow for the u201cno makeupu201d makeup look. Itu2019s buildable and blends out so easily. Iu2019m getting the strawberry while the Sephora sale is still going on!
